to.note: Shinespark and XRayClimb have a direct link. Other strats should go 1 -> 4 -> 2.
Shinespark and XRayClimb have a direct link. Other strats should go 1 -> 4 -> 2 -> 3.
The heat frames for these strats assumes you've already fallen from the door, because the cost is already baked into the subsequent 5-> 3 heat costs when relevant.

strats.name: Direct jump with Screw Attack
note: Jump through the lowest part of the door to enter with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw Attack.

strats.name: Direct jump with SpeedBooster
note: Jump through the lowest part of the door to enter with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks using SpeedBooster.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (HiJump, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Wall Jump, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Wall Jump, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Wall Jump, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump, Screw Attack)
note: To get up most quickly, after using Screw Attack to break up through the bomb blocks, use the next bomb blocks as a platform.

strats.name: Left-Side X-Ray Climb (to Top Door)
strats.devNote: Heat frames split into the actual climb and the setup in the adjacent room.

strats.name: Direct jump with Screw Attack
note: Jump through the lowest part of the door to enter with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw Attack.

strats.name: Direct jump with SpeedBooster
note: Jump through the lowest part of the door to enter with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks using SpeedBooster.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Temporary Blue)
note: In the previous room, press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.
Maintain the temporary blue state to break through the blocks at the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Screw Attack)
Carry G-Mode Morph Back Through
strats.devNote: Artificial morph will allow Samus not to fall; real Morph is not sufficient.

strats.name: Doorway Speedjump
strats.note: Position yourself in the door way, then run and jump. Makes it possible to walljump up.

strats.name: Doorway Spring Ball Jump
note: It may help to disable HiJump first and then re-equip it with the springball jump.
Doing this, the springball jump may be buffered.

strats.name: Doorway CWJ
strats.note: Position Samus in the doorway a few pixels from the edge. Dashing stationary spinjump into a delayed CWJ and hopefully catch the upper ledge with a walljump.

strats.name: Transition Screwjump
strats.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.

strats.name: Transition Screwjump (Tricky Jump)
strats.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.

strats.name: Transition Screwjump (No Walljump)
strats.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.

strats.name: Transition Screwjump (Tricky Dash Jump)
strats.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.

strats.name: Jump into Room Shinespark
note: Jump into the room and spark diagonally once above the center of the door vertically.
Or diagonally spark anywhere that is not the bottom of the door in the previous room.
strats.devNote: TODO: Sparking diagonally through the door cannot be shown as an alternative.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb
strats.devNote: Heat frames split into the actual climb and the setup in the adjacent room.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport Inside Wall
note: After teleporting, Samus should be standing inside the wall.
Retract Grapple by pressing up, which will pull Samus down and right.
Hold right, and release Grapple while still holding right.
Perform a turn-around spin jump (to the left).
Then morph and roll out to the right.

strats.name: Temporary Blue (Come In With Temporary Blue)
Temporary Blue (Come In Shinecharging)
devNote: If the previous room is heated and canXRayCancelShinecharge is not an option, then this strat saves heat frames compared to waiting out the shinecharge frames in the other room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, End Shinecharged (Temporary Blue)
strats.note: Store the shinecharge just before the door transition, so that Samus slides off the ledge, to gain a temporary blue state to break the blocks.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, End Shinecharged (Screw Attack)
Transition Speedjump with Bombs
strats.note: Run in the adjacent room and jump through the door, to place a Bomb to break the top bomb blocks.

strats.name: Transition Speedjump with Bombs (Tricky Dash Jump)
strats.note: Run in the adjacent room and jump through the door, to place a Bomb to break the top bomb blocks.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Temporary Blue)
note: Press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.
Maintain the temporary blue state to break through the blocks at the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Temporary Blue)
note: Press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.
Maintain the temporary blue state to break through the blocks at the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Full Runway, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Wall Jump)
note: Press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Reset Fall Speed)
note: Press down somewhat precisely to gain the shinecharge while breaking the bomb block.
Then morph, roll off the edge, and unmorph near the door to shoot it open.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark
note: Press down somewhat precisely to gain the shinecharge while breaking the bomb block.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Full Runway, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Full Runway, Screw Attack, Wall Jump)
Temporary Blue (Full Runway)
strats.note: This expects the more controlled Temporary Blue to fall though the blocks, not storing a shinecharge on the first breakable block.

strats.name: Temporary Blue (Short Runway)
strats.note: This expects the more controlled Temporary Blue to fall though the blocks, not storing a shinecharge on the first breakable block.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, End Shinecharged (Temporary Blue)
note: Press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.
Maintain the temporary blue state to break through the blocks at the bottom of the room.
Reach the item while still having a shinecharge.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, End Shinecharged (Full Runway, Screw Attack)
note: Store a shinecharge then use Screw Attack to break through the bomb blocks down to the item location.
Reach the item while still having a shinecharge.
Doing a moonfall can save a few frames.
strats.devNote: Storing the shinecharge on the left side of the runway takes fine control over shinecharge spacing, but that is ok at this difficulty.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, End Shinecharged (Screw Attack)
note: Enter with a shinecharge, and use Screw Attack to break the bomb blocks and descend quickly.
Reach the item while still having a shinecharge.
Doing a moonfall can save a few frames.

strats.name: Stored Moonfall Clip
note: Moonfall to clip through the Bomb blocks to the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Come in Getting Blue Speed
strats.devNote: FIXME: Running in is not required. Entering the room with canBlueSpaceJump could work, for example.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport Extension Clip
note: After teleporting, as Samus swings to the right, begin holding down to extend Grapple just as Samus is slightly right of vertical.
Samus should swing back left and get stuck on the floor one tile to the right of the Grapple attachment point.
Release Grapple and Samus will clip through the floor.

strats.name: Stored Moonfall Clip
note: Moonfall to clip through the Bomb blocks
Break spin with Shot or Angle Aim to avoid clipping all the way to the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Start Shinecharged, Shinespark
strats.note: Diagonally shinespark towards the middle door.

strats.name: Start Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Wall Jump)
Start Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump, Bottom Position)
Start Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump, Top Position)
IBJ
devNote: FIXME: This is a longer IBJ if B is broken with a power bomb (All the blocks are broken).

strats.name: IBJ to Break the Top Blocks
strats.note: Place a Power Bomb during the IBJ to break the blocks without falling.

strats.name: Power Bombs
devNote: FIXME: This doesn't quite break the blocks above, but going up after has more requirements.
The canTrivialMidAirMorph could be avoided by using Spring Ball on entry or from the doorsill.

strats.name: IBJ to Break the Top Blocks
strats.note: Expects that Samus falls down afterwards.
strats.devNote: FIXME: This assumes B is not broken, add other IBJ variants.

strats.name: Springwall with Bombs
strats.note: Use a Springwall to get up to the bomb blocks, to break them with a bomb.

notables.name: Transition Screwjump
notables.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.

notables.name: Transition Speedjump with Bombs
notables.note: Run in the adjacent room and jump through the door, to place a Bomb to break the obstacle.

notables.name: Doorway CWJ
notables.note: Position Samus in the doorway a few pixels from the edge. Dashing stationary spinjump into a delayed CWJ and hopefully catch the upper ledge with a walljump.

notables.name: Grapple Teleport Inside Wall
note: After teleporting, Samus should be standing inside the wall.
Retract Grapple by pressing up, which will pull Samus down and right.
Hold right, and release Grapple while still holding right.
Perform a turn-around spin jump (to the left).
Then morph and roll out to the right.
